title: Core Teaching-Based Learning Program for Elementary Science Teachers' Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science education theory and basic experimental methods
context.additional_context: Flexible learning environments using digital devices, structured around case-based scenarios for application in actual classroom settings.

learning_goals: Applying an instructional core-based learning framework enables designing connectivity between content-pedagogy-student achievement in elementary science classes
Science experiment lesson designs and evaluation tools utilizing digital devices (e.g., tablets, educational apps) can be developed
Collaboratively analyzing lesson cases with peer teachers and proposing feedback-based improvement strategies is possible
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
